## SetRequired type

Make some properties in T required.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type SetRequired<T, K extends Keys<T>> = Simplify<
  StrictOmit<T, K> & Required<Pick<T, K>>
>
```
<b>References:</b> [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)<!-- -->, [Simplify](./types-kit.simplify.md)<!-- -->, [StrictOmit](./types-kit.strictomit.md)

## Example


```ts
interface Props {
      a?: number;
      b?: number;
      c?: number;
    };
   // Expect: {  a: number;  b: number; c?: number; }
   type NewProps = SetRequired<Props, 'a' | 'b'>;
```
